content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 3, Newcastle United 1.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 3, Newcastle United 1.
Foul by Jamaal Lascelles (Newcastle United).
Brahim Diaz (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Dwight Gayle (Newcastle United) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Jonjo Shelvey with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Jacob Murphy (Newcastle United) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jonjo Shelvey.
Substitution, Manchester City. Brahim Diaz replaces Leroy Sané.
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mohamed Diamé (Newcastle United).
Substitution, Manchester City. Bernardo Silva replaces Raheem Sterling.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Jamaal Lascelles.
Attempt blocked. Fernandinho (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Goal!  Manchester City 3, Newcastle United 1. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Leroy Sané.
Foul by Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City).
Isaac Hayden (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Sergio Agüero.
Foul by Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City).
Mohamed Diamé (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Ciaran Clark (Newcastle United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Ciaran Clark (Newcastle United).
Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Dwight Gayle replaces Joselu.
Attempt missed. David Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by DeAndre Yedlin.
Attempt saved. Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Oleksandr Zinchenko.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Isaac Hayden.
Offside, Newcastle United. Ciaran Clark tries a through ball, but Ayoze Pérez is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. Mohamed Diamé (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right.
Attempt saved. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Leroy Sané.
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by DeAndre Yedlin.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Paul Dummett.

Goal!  Manchester City 2, Newcastle United 1. Jacob Murphy (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ciaran Clark with a through ball following a fast break.
Substitution, Newcastle United. DeAndre Yedlin replaces Javier Manquillo.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Paul Dummett (Newcastle United).
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ciaran Clark (Newcastle United).
Substitution, Newcastle United. Ayoze Pérez replaces Christian Atsu.
Goal!  Manchester City 2, Newcastle United 0. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty Manchester City. Raheem Sterling draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Javier Manquillo (Newcastle United) after a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Joselu.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Isaac Hayden.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
